Hazelmere is a gnome who lives on a small archipelago just east of Yanille. Hazelmere was the last surviving creator of the Grand Tree, a massive living fortress within the Gnome Stronghold. He is also an accomplished battle mage, tree whisperer, soothsayer, and telepath with a great knowledge of history and culture. Hazelmere plays a prominent role in The Grand Tree, and The Eyes of Glouphrie quests.

There is a fairy ring nearby, the code being CLS.

Treasure Trails[edit | edit source]

  • Hazelmere is the solution to the medium cryptic clue: Speak to Hazelmere. The answer to the challenge scroll 19^3 is 6859.

Note that the amounts of the rewards are incomplete and are being updated with the variable range of the items given.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

Even though you can translate his talk in The Grand Tree, afterwards and before he only says Blah Blah Blah instead of Gnome words. This might be because they wanted to force you into the magic requirement of Eyes of Glouphrie.
